revision.text: Possibly: Two Treatises I. A General View of Christian Religion. In Eight Positions, II. An Entrance into the Doctrine of Christianity, by Catechetical Institution . Each of them Confirmed by S. Scripture, and Adapted to Vugar Capacity, by Clear and Genuine Explication. By Lawrence Fogg, D. D. and Dean of Chester. (Chester : Printed by E. Ince, for R. Minshell, in Bridge-Street, 1712). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2412978~S1
